alert.note: Alert for East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 01 at 1:31AM MDT until November 03 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin and East Platte County. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
